lines.gurmukhi: pvnih pvn imlq nhI pyKIAq silly sill imlq nw pihcwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Pavanahi Pavan Milat Nahee Paykheeata , Salilay Salil Milat Naa Pahichaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Air mixed with air and water mixed with water cannot be distinguished.

lines.gurmukhi: joqI imly joiq hoq iBMn iBMn kYsy kir Bsmih Bsm smwnI kYsy jwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Jotee Milay Joti Hot Bhinn Bhinn Kaisay Kari , Bhasamahi Bhasam Samaanee Kaisay Jaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: How can light merging with another light be seen separately? How can ashes mixed with ashes be distinguished?

lines.gurmukhi: kYsy pMcqq mylu Kylu hoq ipMf pRwn ibCurq ipMf pRwn kYsy aunmwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaisay Panchatat Maylu Khaylu Hot Pind Praana , Bichhurat Pind Praan Kaisay Ounamaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Who knows how a body constituted of five elements take shape? How can one discern what happens to the soul when it leaves the body?

lines.gurmukhi: Aibgq giq Aiq ibsm Ascrj mY igAwn iDAwn Agimiq kYsy aur AwnIAY ]196]
lines.transliteration_english: Abigat Gati Ati Bisam Asacharaj Mai , Giaan Dhiaan Agamiti Kaisay Ur Aaneeai ?196?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly no one can assess the state of such Sikhs who have become one with the True Guru. That state is astonishing and wonderful. It cannot be known through the knowledge of scriptures nor through contemplation. One cannot even make an estimate or a gu
